EmailTemplate.name: Medical Book Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Medical Book Expiration Notice-{!Account.FirstName} {!Account.LastName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Medical Book Expiration Notice:
Please note that {!Account.FirstName} {!Account.LastName}'s medical book will be expiring soon. See details below:
Medical Book Expiration Date: {!Account.Medical_Book_Expiry_Date__c}
Consult Employee record for more details.
